name: TimelineTab
functionalRequirements:
## Timeline Tab

### Purpose
Displays chronological timeline of events and activities.

### Features
- Chronological event display
- Event filtering
- Date range selection
- Event type icons
technicalDesign:
## Implementation

### Props
- events: Array of timeline events
- dateRange: Date filter range
- filters: Event type filters

properties.name: events
properties.type: Array<{id: string, type: string, subject: string, description: string, date: string, icon: string}>
